doc.title: God and the Machine
doc.plot: Every one of us has worked a meaningless job. Wasting away our very humanity. Creating a society of mindless soulless beings. There's more to human existence than worthless blue-collar labor...or is there? Now facing the everyday routine tasks of a consumerist society, a worker finds a way to release from mindless tasks by freeing the mind-- escaping. God and The Machine is an experimental film set around a factory. Through the use of German expressionistic style, the screen is filled with unforgettable symbolic images.
